metadata.title: Economic and Cultural Impacts of Colonialism in the 19th Century

abstract.text: Colonialism reshaped political, economic, and cultural systems across large parts of the world. This paper examines the long-term effects of colonial rule on indigenous societies.

body_text.text: European colonial expansion altered traditional governance structures and introduced new economic systems based on resource extraction.
Archival records and economic data were analyzed to assess changes in trade patterns and social hierarchies.
Findings indicate persistent economic inequality and cultural disruption in post-colonial societies.
